library(dygraphs)

library(magrittr)
library(janitor)
library(anytime)
library(knitr)
library(details)

dyCrosshair <- function(dygraph, 
                        direction = c("both", "horizontal", "vertical")) {
  dyPlugin(
    dygraph = dygraph,
    name = "Crosshair",
    path = system.file("plugins/crosshair.js", 
                       package = "dygraphs"),
    options = list(direction = match.arg(direction))
  )
}
fun_fecha <-function(from, to, by, each) {
  rep(seq(anydate(from),
          anydate(to),
          by = by), each = each)
}
fun_excel <-function(file, range, col_names, from, to, by, each) {
  
  data <- 
    rio::import(
      file,
      setclass = "tbl_df",
      range = range,
      col_names = col_names,
      .name_repair = "unique_quiet") %!>%
    remove_empty(c("rows", "cols")) %!>%
    replace(is.na(.), 0)
  data %<>%
    pivot_longer(!...1) %<>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = "...1",
                values_from = "value") %<>%
    dplyr::select(-name)
  
  fecha <- fun_fecha(from,to,by,each)
  data <- cbind(fecha, data) 
  data <- as_tibble(data)
  
}


#BANCO CENTRAL DE BOLIVIA

base_mon <- file <- "C:/Users/Mauro/Desktop/bases_de_datos/bolivia/banco_central/4.mensual/1.monetario/01.base_monetaria.xlsx"

#IMPORTAR DATOS DE EXCEL
range <- "D24:S312"
col_names <- FALSE
#FORMATO FECHA
from <- "31Dec1998"
to <- "31Dec2022"
by <- "month"
each <- 1

fecha <- fun_fecha(from,to,by,each)

base_mon <- 
  rio::import(
    base_mon,
    setclass = "tbl_df",
    range = range,
    col_names = col_names,
    .name_repair = "unique_quiet") %!>%
  remove_empty(c("rows", "cols")) %!>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0)

colnames(base_mon) <- c(

  "Reservas Internacionales Netas",
  "Reservas Internacionales Brutas",
  "Obligaciones Externas a Corto Plazo",
  "Crédito Neto al Sector Público",
  "Total Crédito a Bancos",
  "BCL",
  "BE Y OEF",
  "Títulos Regulación Monetaria",
  "SRD",
  "Otras Cuentas Netas",
  "Base Monetaria",
  "Billetes y Monedas en poder del Público",
  "Reservas Bancarias en Moneda Nacional",
  "Reservas Bancarias en UFV",
  "Reservas Bancarias en Moneda Extranjera",
  "Total Reservas Bancarias"
  )

base_mon <- cbind(fecha, base_mon) 
base_mon <- as_tibble(base_mon)

base_mon <- base_mon %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric),  ~ . / 1000)) #EN MILLONES

origen <- base_mon %!>% 
  select(fecha, 
         `Reservas Internacionales Netas`,
         `Crédito Neto al Sector Público`,
         `Total Crédito a Bancos`,
         `Títulos Regulación Monetaria`,
         `Otras Cuentas Netas`)

destino <- base_mon %!>% 
  select(fecha, 
         `Billetes y Monedas en poder del Público`,
         `Total Reservas Bancarias`) 



knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, error = TRUE)

### Banco Central de Bolivia (BCB)

```{r origen_bm, out.width='50%', echo=FALSE}
dygraph(origen, main = "Origen de la Base Monetaria<br><small>(En Millones de Bs)</small>") %!>%
  dySeries("Reservas Internacionales Netas") %!>%
  dySeries("Crédito Neto al Sector Público") %!>%
  dySeries("Total Crédito a Bancos") %!>%
  dySeries("Títulos Regulación Monetaria") %!>%
  dySeries("Otras Cuentas Netas")  %!>%
  dyLegend(width = 900, show = "onmouseover") %!>%
  dyOptions(stackedGraph = TRUE, axisLineColor = "#4a4a4a") %!>%
  dyAxis("x", drawGrid = FALSE) %>%
  dyAxis("y",
         gridLineColor = "#98918B",
         valueFormatter = 'function(d){return Math.round(d).toString().replace(/\\B(?=(\\d{3})+(?!\\d))/g, ",");}',
         axisLabelFormatter = 'function(d){return d.toString().replace(/\\B(?=(\\d{3})+(?!\\d))/g, ",");}'
  ) %!>%
  dyCrosshair(direction = "vertical") %!>%
  dyRangeSelector(height = 30) %!>%
  dyHighlight(highlightCircleSize = 1,
              highlightSeriesBackgroundAlpha = 0.1) %!>%
  dyUnzoom()
```
